summary: REQ-2 appears implemented: the exact sentence "We have a warehouse in Wada MIDC" is added visibly on the Contact page (contact info card) and also in the footer (optional). REQ-1 appears implemented in the shown diffs (no visible instances of the word "recycling" in the modified public-facing copy), but full-site verification is limited by truncation and the absence of diffs for all shared/public components.
